import React , {useState}from 'react' import { FaBars } from "react-icons/fa"; import { AiOutlineClose } from "react-icons/ai" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" function Navbar() { const [sidebar, setSidebar] = useState(false) const showSidebar = () => setSidebar(!sidebar) return ( <>
) } export default Navbar
